data.meta_description: Provides a mailing address for requesting autographs and sending fan mail to Susannah Harker
data.text:
Fan mail address:

Susannah Harker

Emptage Hallett

3rd Floor

34-35 Eastcastle Street

London W1W 8DW

UK

Not an updated address?

Please let us know! Address information:

Emptage Hallett

(Talent and Literary Agency)

3rd Floor

34-35 Eastcastle Street

London W1W 8DW

UK

Phone: +44 (0)20 7436 0425

Fax: +44 (0)20 7580 2748

Official website

Note: View larger map

If you want to request an autograph, follow the guidelines bellow. If you just want to mail a letter with the address above, and do not want anything back, then you can stop reading! If you live in UK send a properly stamped and self addressed envelope (minimum size 8.5" x 4") with your request letter and a photo. You can include a piece of cardboard to keep the photo from bending in shipping and also add "Do Not Bend" on the envelopes. Send your letter and wait. On average, there is going to be a 3+ month wait for a response. If you do not live in UK, you can purchase your british stamps here *For information on postage prices to receive a letter from UK click here.
